meanings.sent1: She constricted her hand into a fist.
meanings.sent2: The snake constricted its prey tightly.
meanings.sent3: The constricted tube made it hard for the water to flow smoothly.
meanings.sent4: His fear constricted his chest like a tight band.
meanings.sent5: The constricted opening barely allowed any light to pass through.

meanings.definition: Restricted or limited in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The constricted room felt cramped and stuffy.
meanings.sent2: Her constricted budget made it difficult to afford luxuries.
meanings.sent3: The constricted time frame added an element of challenge to the game.
meanings.sent4: The constricted view from the window only showed a small corner of the garden.
meanings.sent5: The constricted space forced everyone to stand close together.
